description: The Broadblade provided by the Pioneer Association for the explorers is brightly colored, not easy to lose, hard in texture, and can cope with various extreme environments for a long time, and is very popular among the explorers.
ranks: When Resonance Skill is released, restores Resonance Energy by 8. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 20s.
